title: Letter to Pachnoubis
description:
Letter to Pachnoubis concerning farm affairs. Nine lines of text.
Sent by a landlord to one of his tenants, to allow a certain Carus to take pruning knives and other necessary tools with him, as he has leased a vineyard from the landlord.

Condition: damaged upper left and lower right.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
